hadiths.text: It was narrated that Tamim Dari said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: ‘At the end of time there will be people who will cut off camels’ humps and sheep’s tails. But what is cut from a living animal is dead.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا قُطِعَ مِنَ الْبَهِيمَةِ وَهِيَ حَيَّةٌ
chapter.eng-name: What is cut from an animal when it is still alive
